title: Spacebase DF-9 [Alpha 4b] (Update ONLY)
description:
Spacebase DF-9 Alpha 4b Update

Update files from alpha 4b, you NEED to already have the alpha 4a files!
Decompress and overwrite the files in the game directory to update.

Fixed: Various pathfinding issues.  Some of these fixes greatly improve technician efficiency.

Genre: Sandbox / Indie
Developer: Double Fine Productions

Publication Type: Digital License [Steam-Rip]
Language: English

System Requirements
Minimum:
OS: Windows XP
Processor: Core 2 Duo or Higher
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 with 384 MB of RAM
Hard Drive: 200 MB available space
Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

Installation Instruction:
1) Have Alpha 4a Already Installed.
2) Extract inside the game folder, and overwrite the files.
3) Run using Space.exe
